overview:
Giuseppe De Giorgi is co-founder of Fubles.com, a Social Sport Sharing Platform that had built one of the most active sport community in Europe.

He led the user acquisition strategy and manages business operations including marketing, sales, online advertising, human resources, fundraising and communications. Previously, Giuseppe worked both in the innovation sector for the Technology Business Center of Politecnico di Milano and in the management consulting sector for Accenture.

Giuseppe, 25, is an engineer and entrepreneur passionate about technologies that simplify the way people live disrupting the out-of-date market. He holds a masterâ€™s degree in economic and management engineering and a bachelorâ€™s degree in industrial engineer from Politecnico di Milano.
